body_html:
I ran this with gdb --args python main.py and got the following stack trace. This is with the current master (0.2.0+40ca356):

#0  0x00007ffff6a1d428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
#1  0x00007ffff6a1f02a in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007fff79cfebb5 in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007fff79cfcd56 in ?? () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007fff79cfbdb9 in ?? () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007fff79cfc9ca in __gxx_personality_v0 () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007ffff499e863 in _Unwind_RaiseException_Phase2 (exc=exc@entry=0x114b090, context=context@entry=0x7fffffffdfb0) at ../.././libgcc/unwind.inc:62
#7  0x00007ffff499ebfb in _Unwind_RaiseException (exc=0x114b090) at ../.././libgcc/unwind.inc:131
#8  0x00007fff79cfcf95 in __cxa_throw () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#9  0x00007fffc9bd9322 in gloo::CudaHostPointer<float>::~CudaHostPointer() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#10 0x00007fffc9bc4122 in gloo::CudaBroadcastOneToAll<float, gloo::CudaHostWorkspace<float> >::~CudaBroadcastOneToAll() ()
   from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#11 0x00007fffd5485b69 in std::_Sp_counted_base<(__gnu_cxx::_Lock_policy)2>::_M_release (this=0x2fa4d320) at /home/curiousbot/anaconda/gcc/include/c++/bits/shared_ptr_base.h:144
#12 0x00007fffc9aa1c72 in std::_Tuple_impl<0ul, std::shared_ptr<gloo::Algorithm>, std::shared_ptr<char>, std::shared_ptr<char>, std::shared_ptr<std::mutex> >::~_Tuple_impl() ()
   from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#13 0x00007fffc9a9db9f in thd::DataChannelGloo::~DataChannelGloo() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#14 0x00007fffc9a9dbc9 in thd::DataChannelGloo::~DataChannelGloo() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#15 0x00007fffc9ac5742 in std::unique_ptr<thd::DataChannel, std::default_delete<thd::DataChannel> >::~unique_ptr() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#16 0x00007ffff6a21ff8 in __run_exit_handlers (status=0, listp=0x7ffff6dac5f8 <__exit_funcs>, run_list_atexit=run_list_atexit@entry=true) at exit.c:82
#17 0x00007ffff6a22045 in __GI_exit (status=<optimized out>) at exit.c:104
#18 0x00007ffff6a08837 in __libc_start_main (main=0x400980 <main>, argc=2, argv=0x7fffffffe4f8, init=<optimized out>, fini=<optimized out>, rtld_fini=<optimized out>, stack_end=0x7fffffffe4e8)
    at ../csu/libc-start.c:325

body:
I ran this with `gdb --args python main.py`  and got the following stack trace. This is with the current master (`0.2.0+40ca356`):
```
#0  0x00007ffff6a1d428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
#1  0x00007ffff6a1f02a in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007fff79cfebb5 in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007fff79cfcd56 in ?? () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007fff79cfbdb9 in ?? () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007fff79cfc9ca in __gxx_personality_v0 () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007ffff499e863 in _Unwind_RaiseException_Phase2 (exc=exc@entry=0x114b090, context=context@entry=0x7fffffffdfb0) at ../.././libgcc/unwind.inc:62
#7  0x00007ffff499ebfb in _Unwind_RaiseException (exc=0x114b090) at ../.././libgcc/unwind.inc:131
#8  0x00007fff79cfcf95 in __cxa_throw () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/libstdc++.so.6
#9  0x00007fffc9bd9322 in gloo::CudaHostPointer<float>::~CudaHostPointer() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#10 0x00007fffc9bc4122 in gloo::CudaBroadcastOneToAll<float, gloo::CudaHostWorkspace<float> >::~CudaBroadcastOneToAll() ()
   from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#11 0x00007fffd5485b69 in std::_Sp_counted_base<(__gnu_cxx::_Lock_policy)2>::_M_release (this=0x2fa4d320) at /home/curiousbot/anaconda/gcc/include/c++/bits/shared_ptr_base.h:144
#12 0x00007fffc9aa1c72 in std::_Tuple_impl<0ul, std::shared_ptr<gloo::Algorithm>, std::shared_ptr<char>, std::shared_ptr<char>, std::shared_ptr<std::mutex> >::~_Tuple_impl() ()
   from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
#13 0x00007fffc9a9db9f in thd::DataChannelGloo::~DataChannelGloo() () from /home/curiousbot/anaconda/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1

#16 0x00007ffff6a21ff8 in __run_exit_handlers (status=0, listp=0x7ffff6dac5f8 <__exit_funcs>, run_list_atexit=run_list_atexit@entry=true) at exit.c:82
```
